title: 'The Big Bang Theory' star Kaley Cuoco is selling her California villa for $4.9 million—take a look inside
text:
Kaley Cuoco, star of CBS's "The Big Bang Theory," is selling her villa in Tarzana, California, for $4.9 million, a reduction from the orginal $6.9 million listing price in May. The home, about 20 miles outside of L.A., was previously owned by Khloe Kardashian, according to People. Take a look inside. The 7,977-square-foot, six-bedroom and nine-bathroom, Mediterranean-style villa is in a gated community, Mulholland Park, and was built in 2003, according to the listing by Stephanie Vitacco.

Andrew Orozco

The villa has a two-story foyer and staircase with an iron railing.

Andrew Orozco

The kitchen has a central island and a breakfast nook.

Andrew Orozco

The outdoor area has a large swimming pool with a built-in hot tub.

Andrew Orozco

One of the living areas is decorated with a chair swing and has a fireplace.

Andrew Orozco

The master suite also has a fireplace, as well as French doors leading to a terrace.

Andrew Orozco

The master bathroom has dual sinks and a spa tub with outdoor views.

Andrew Orozco

There is also a home theater.

Andrew Orozco
description: The Tarzana, California home Kaley Cuoco is selling was previously owned by Khloe Kardashian.
